sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Find the sys_flow_context for the flow for which this error subflow has been called
Find the sys_flow_context for this subflow for the current Error handling subflow

sys_hub_input_scripts.script: {"work_notes":{"scriptActive":true,"script":"var lookupSysId \u003d fd_data._3__look_up_record.record.sys_id;\nvar wf_string \u003d \u0027[code]\u003ca href\u003d\"/$flow-designer.do#/operations/context/\u0027 + lookupSysId + \u0027\" target\u003d\"_blank\"\u003eGo to the flow in a new tab\u003c/a\u003e[/code]\u0027;\nreturn wf_string;","savedValue":""}}

{"thiscontext":{"scriptActive":true,"script":"// gets the ID of the current flow context so we can link to it from the Incident\nvar contextId \u003d FlowScriptAPI.getContextID();\nreturn contextId;"}}
